org.bouncycastle.jce

Class X509KeyUsage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1Object
      • org.bouncycastle.jce.X509KeyUsage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ASN1Encodable, Encodable

    public class X509KeyUsage
extends ASN1Object
    A holding class for constructing an X509 Key Usage extension. 
        id-ce-keyUsage OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::=  { id-ce 15 }

    KeyUsage ::= BIT STRING {
         digitalSignature        (0),
         nonRepudiation          (1),
         keyEncipherment         (2),
         dataEncipherment        (3),
         keyAgreement            (4),
         keyCertSign             (5),
         cRLSign                 (6),
         encipherOnly            (7),
         decipherOnly            (8) }

    • Constructor Detail

      • X509KeyUsage

        public X509KeyUsage(int usage)
        Basic constructor.
        Parameters:
        usage - - the bitwise OR of the Key Usage flags giving the allowed uses for the key. e.g. (X509KeyUsage.keyEncipherment | X509KeyUsage.dataEncipherment)
